page.title: 14CLUBS,SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: called Coppet Week.Locally owned boats moored in the harbour can take part in daily races throughout August.Cups and other prizes are presented at the annual club dinner,held in December. Other local clubs and societies include.Guides,Brownies, Scouts,and Cubs;Judo;Womens Institute; Sports Club(junior + senior football,cricket, darts,pool,snooker and dominoes); Saundersfoot Junior Choir ; {The Judo Club,}formed in 1983 has 30 members,who may be as young as years. {The Women's Institute}has 56 members and is a thriving local institution.
